Find covariates or outcomes from the registers

Source: R/searchR.R
searchR.Rd

Find covariates or outcomes from the registers

Usage

searchR(
  reglist,
  search.list,
  sub.list = list(),
  sub.labels = NULL,
  exclusion = "NULL",
  slice = "first",
  format = "date",
  date.filter = NULL,
  match = "start",
  casename = "index",
  pnr = pnr
)

Arguments

reglist

list of dataframe(s)

search.list

list with list(label = diagnosis code) structure.

sub.list

list of variables where the diagnosis code should be kept (e.g. list("KOL" = "subtype"))

sub.labels

list of labels for the diagnosis code colum (e.g. list("subtype" = list("a" = c("DC1", "DC2"))))

exclusion

vector of diagnosis codes for exclusion

slice

which rows should be selected (first(default)/last/all)

format

whether selected rows should contain date or 1

match

the match of the regex code (match, start, end or contains(default))

casename

the name of the case variable (default = "index")

pnr

name of the pnr column

Value

A dataframe with the selected columns with corresponding diagnosis codes
